body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Count On Us, an accounting firm. My name is Dylan Martin. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Diana Parker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. Can you kindly provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is diana.parker@email.com and my phone number is five five five - three two one - zero zero nine nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. I have noted your email as diana.parker@email.com and phone number as five five five - three two one - zero zero nine nine. Is there anything specific you'd like assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the quality of service provided recently.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for your experience, Diana. We value your feedback and will make sure to address this issue promptly. Your satisfaction is important to us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Diana. We appreciate your time and will work on improving our services. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diana. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day! Goodbye.
